issue.title: [CF 1342] Examples forum
issue.body:
Curseforge updated!

Examples forum gone :(

 

Any chance it is coming back?


> Posted by CurseForge user Distractor_Beam | Imported from CurseForge issue #1342 | Raw

comments.body:
Looks like Curse got rid of them. https://www.curseforge.com/forums/wow-sites/wow-sites-feedback/127024-no-more-project-forums

 

I don't even know what to say.

Edited Nov 19, 2016

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

That's a bummer.  People need to post on that link and ask to get them back :)

*hint hint*

Edited Nov 20, 2016

> Posted by CurseForge user Distractor_Beam

So sad =(
I need to know how to manage TMW to show - Time in combat, but link doesn't work anymore.

Edited Nov 23, 2016

> Posted by CurseForge user lankomi

Added information to the main project description about what happened, and provided that link for people to give feedback.

 

Closing this now since that's all I can do.

Edited Nov 26, 2016

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
